metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20612 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins 2.329 and earlier, LTS 2.319.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger build of job without parameters when no security realm is set.

criterions.comment: jenkins: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
